channel.title: Weird problem

item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

My server is based off [PI] and for some reason the auto-retaliate is like kind of messed up. Even if it’s on the player still attacks back. Can someone tell me how to make it 100%?

Here’s what I have in Clickingbttons.java

case 150: if (c.autoRet == 0) c.autoRet = 1; else c.autoRet = 0; break;

And here’s what I have in NPChandler.java

if (c.playerIndex <= 0 && c.npcIndex <= 0) if (c.autoRet == 1) c.npcIndex = i; if(c.attackTimer <= 3 || c.attackTimer == 0 && c.npcIndex == 0 && c.oldNpcIndex == 0) { c.startAnimation(c.getCombat().getBlockEmote()); }

Is there something else I need to show you guys too help me fix the problem?

Read full topic
